attributes.action: call upon The Queen to give approval for the immediate dissolution of Parliament, in order that the tax-paying public can vote out the expenses cheats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The man in the street needs politicians who are there to represent the electorate with honesty, rather than to have their snouts in the trough, lining their own pockets and looking after their vested interests.We also need the power to fire them if they are caught with their fingers in the till. We are their employers,after all, and they should be answerable to us. They are not, and should never be, above the law!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
